file_content.text: Your son. Alive.
You said we would discuss Claw.
An associate of Claw's--dealt with, as you requested.
I take it you're the client.
And you're the contractors? An impressive group.
And I take it you're the contractor.
Dariana Frayus, matriarch of House Frayus. I require your services in the disbanding of a particular group of local nuisances. They answer to a hooligan who calls himself "Claw".
Hooligans and nuisances? That won't be a problem.
Consider them disbanded.
Nuisances? I like the sound they make when their throats are under my heel.
They'll get squashed.
You're matriarch of a House of Alderaan. Why the need for outside help?
Don't you have staff for this?
We are a lesser House--not a militaristic power like House Organa. Perhaps if we had confronted him sooner....
My, how descriptive. I only hope that I never become an obstacle to you as Claw has to me.
I should hope not, but I would like to caution you all the same.
He began as a harmless prankster, our Claw, but now he has escalated--demolitions, armed robberies, kidnappings. Innocents have died because of his thoughtless antics.
Deal with Claw's associates; then perhaps we could discuss what to do about the young man himself.
You'll find a little less trouble surfacing around House Frayus after today.
In carbonite. Perfect for display in the public square.
Well done. I feel less troubled already.
Yes, of course. Claw. The most heinous of them all. My son.
He was such a good-natured boy before he fell in with the wrong crowd. And now....
We must all pay the price for our wrongs. He will pay his, as I will mine. Go to him and see that justice is done.
Claw is dead.
Thank you. I believe I will let him remain this way for a time--at least until I devise a plan to rehabilitate him.
I knew it might come to that--but I fear my son may have already died the day he became Claw.
All of your work is greatly appreciated. Good day to you.
Here. I believe you've earned this.
